All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextualSmoother, UsesLogger
public class DefaultContextualSmoother
extends AdditiveContextualSmoother
implements ContextualSmoother

Default contextual smoother.

The default contextual smoother is an additive smoother which uses 0.001 as the additive smoothing constant.
